title: Competency Development Program Connecting Innovation and Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic verbal communication skills and fundamental job-related knowledge
context.additional_context: For practitioners requiring language learning and innovation capability enhancement in multicultural environments

learning_goals: Learners can acquire at least three new language-learning methods from peers through open-minded thinking (OM) and humble behavior over eight weeks.
Learners can propose and develop implementation plans for two or more team-based innovative ideas through project-based tasks.
